review.description:
Hawk's Orchard is newly opened in 2013 on weekends only.They grow apple varieties including Honey Crisp, Jonagold, Golden Delicious, Haralson, Macintosh, Ida Red, Zestar, Gala, Fuji, Cortland, and Empire. Also available for purchase are local honey and fresh cider. 

The apples are amazing! A great place to take the family and enjoy some nature.
review.author: Kathleen R.
